Metadata.Title: 7.1.1 Define Access Needs for Each Role

Content.Data:
==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 7.1.1
==Policy Statement==
Define the level of privilege required for each system resource for all user roles.
==Policy Purpose==
The required level of privilege has to be determined before corresponding access controls can be implemented.
